dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5162 IH: Parity for Alaska Native and Native Hawaiian Students in Agriculture Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Tokuda (for herself, Mr. Case, and Mrs. Peltola) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 to extend education grant programs for Alaska Native serving institutions and Native Hawaiian serving institutions, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Parity for Alaska Native and Native Hawaiian Students in Agriculture Act.

section.header: Education grants to Alaska Native serving institutions and Native Hawaiian serving institutions
section.text: Section 1419B of the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 (7 U.S.C. 3156) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting after paragraph (2) the following:

paragraph.text: A grant made under this subsection shall be for a period of not more than 3 years.

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (4) (as so redesignated), by striking $10,000,000 in fiscal years 2001 through 2023 and inserting $10,000,000 for fiscal year 2023 and $15,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2028; and
by inserting after paragraph (2) the following:

paragraph.text: A grant made under this subsection shall be for a period of not more than 3 years.

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (4) (as so redesignated), by striking $10,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2001 through 2023 and inserting $10,000,000 for fiscal year 2023 and $15,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2028.
